+import java.io.{FileInputStream, FileOutputStream, File}
+import java.util.jar.{JarEntry, JarOutputStream}

+
+object TestUtils {
+
+  /** Create a jar file that contains this set of files. All files will be located at the root
+    * of the jar. */

comments.body: Do we really need this or could we ship a .jar file around for use in tests? I believe we had one for some other tests with addJar.

comments.body: We can't include a compiled `.jar` file in the Spark repo but we could create a project in the build that builds a test jar. I thought this was strictly better since we can test more sophisticated things down the road given this mechanism.

taking a while.
